name: Proto Space
description:
Welcome to Proto Space, as captain of Humanity's first manned faster than light ship, your job is to seek out habitable planets to ensure Humanity's proliferation throughout the cosmos, but be wary, the universe can be a dangerous place, especially for ships so far away from home...

Current Features:


Procedural Planets:

        

Tech Tree Progression:

This version is the demo release however I hit a few speed bumps over the last few days of development that require extensive rewrites, which leaves this a bit more unfinished than I intended. 

I'm very much interested in suggestions for the game, while I have the basic idea outlined, mechanics are subject to change.

Below is a list of planned Demo updates. (Not necessarily a full list)

Planned Demo Updates:

  • Better Sound
  • Music
  • Bug Fixes
  • UI Work
  • Updated Tech Tree System

Below here is a list of features planned for the full release. (Not necessarily a full list)

Planned Features:

  • Custom Player Events
  • Improved/Varied Planet Generation
  • Interactive Text Based Events
  • Viewing Individual Colonized Planets
  • Large Tech Tree Expansion
  • Overarching Story Line Told Through Events

Linux version currently untested

Found a bug? Leave a comment, I'll try to help
